name: Kroger Co.
description: Kroger Co. is one of the largest supermarket chains in the United States, providing a wide range of grocery, pharmacy, and general merchandise products. Founded in 1883 by Bernard Kroger in Cincinnati, Ohio, the company has grown to operate nearly 2,800 grocery retail stores under various banners, including Kroger, Ralphs, Fred Meyer, and Harris Teeter. Kroger is committed to serving its customers by offering quality products at competitive prices while also prioritizing sustainability and community engagement. The company has made significant strides in enhancing its digital capabilities, including online grocery shopping and delivery services, to meet the evolving needs of consumers. Kroger's pharmacy services are also a vital part of its business, providing health care solutions to customers. The company emphasizes its commitment to sourcing locally, reducing food waste, and promoting healthier lifestyles through various initiatives. With a focus on innovation and customer satisfaction, Kroger continues to adapt to the rapidly changing retail landscape.

seo.meta_description: Explore Kroger Co., one of the largest supermarket chains in the U.S., offering a wide variety of groceries, pharmacy services, and general merchandise.

faq.question: What is Kroger known for?
faq.answer: Kroger is known for being one of the largest supermarket chains in the United States, offering groceries, pharmacy services, and general merchandise.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Kroger?
faq.answer: Rodney McMullen is the CEO of Kroger Co.

faq.question: Where is Kroger headquartered?
faq.answer: Kroger is headquartered in Cincinnati, Ohio, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Kroger sell?
faq.answer: Kroger sells a wide range of products including groceries, pharmacy items, and general merchandise.
